name: Treeplotter
tagline: Trying to make an intelligent tree plotting code, where we just need to tell name of root file and variables to plot and it should do everything else automatically.
body:
### Welcome to Know About TreePlotter.

### Things To Implement
1. Set Option for Stack Plot.
2. Normalize to cross-section.
3. Normalize of a particular data.
4. Put Legend option
5. Need to interface with tdrStyle.C and CMS_lumi.C. Ref link [https://ghm.web.cern.ch/ghm/plots/](https://ghm.web.cern.ch/ghm/plots/)
6. 

### Authors and Contributors
You can @ram1123 a GitHub username to generate a link to their profile. The resulting `<a>` element will link to the contributor’s GitHub Profile. For example: In 2007, Chris Wanstrath (@defunkt), PJ Hyett (@pjhyett), and Tom Preston-Werner (@mojombo) founded GitHub.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Macro? 
Please report it [here](https://github.com/ram1123/TreePlotter/issues/new) and we’ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
